page.title: 12Robin Crafts Thorpe In Balne
page.content: {Pottery} The potter has an electric wheel and you stand next to a wall to watch him. When he has finished you can have a go. {Glass Engraving The glass engraver engraves things on glass like animals,cars and birds.The glass engraver engraves glasses too. {Candle making The candle maker makes all different shapes and sizes of candles and sells them to the public. {Leather work Leather work is done by hand. He makes belts, bookmarks and bunnets for hair. {Macrame The people make owls and hanging baskets. At the craft centre they sell little pictures to be sewn and craft materials.
